long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SUPER-EASY PROTOTYPING

Mockup Builder is a prototyping solution that helps design websites, software and mobile applications while reducing the time and cost spent on the negotiation stage. This tool efficiently combines in itself everything needed for wireframe and mockup creation and possibilities for online collaboration. Identify your requirements and get the job done right!

 

MOCK UP CREATION NEVER WAS SO EASY

* 113 UI elements available directly in the library

* Separate library with icons

* 2 styles of all controls

* User-friendly interface with all functionality that you need

* Possibility to work on your projects online

* Desktop version of the software is also available

* Many templates available in Gallery for free

* Import mockup files in .bmml format

* Presentation mode

 

CONVENIENT COLLABORATION

* Share wireframes for review in public or private way

* Add reviewers and editors to the projects

* Discuss your wireframes online in the chat under application

* Export your work to mock up Gallery and share best UX ideas with others

* Export your wireframe in .png, .pdf and .doc format

 

And much more! Just start discovering!

 

TESTIMONIALS
